## Installing **biplotEZ**

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# Install from GitHub
library(devtools)
install_github("MuViSU/biplotEZ_beta")
#check this
library(biplotEZ)
#check this
library(biplotEZ_beta)

# Getting help                 
help(package="biplotEZ")
```

## General notes

::: {.nonincremental}

- Use the native R pipe: |>
- Since %>% is not required, you do not have to load:
```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(magrittr)
```

- To set |> as your default, change the keyboard shortcut **Ctrl-Shift-M**:
![Global options](\images\GlobalOptions.jpg){width=200}
![Global options](\images\NativePipe.jpg){width=350}
:::

## Basic construction

::: {.nonincremental}
- Start with the biplot() function
```{r, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
x <- args(biplot)
print(x)
```

- This will prepare the data and perform the required computations before the biplot construction
- All other functions will follow with a pipe ( |> )
- Use the preferred biplot: PCA(), CVA() - available in current version
- Now a number of formatting changes can be made by calling approproriate functions.

:::
